divs: Sighting DetailsI seen a boomerang shaped craft directly over central phoenix at what appeared to be a fairly high altitude.I percieved the craft to be very large.It was totally silent.It headed to northeast at very smooth high rate of speed,pretty impressive actually, and increasing speed was out of sight in seconds.I lost sight behind my tree. By the time i got up to get around tree it was long gone.I never would have seen it if it hadnt of moved it was camo'd by stars pretty good but when i locked my eyes on it,it was obviously a boomerang shape with lights.In my opinion exactly like they describe on history channel.It reminded me of a ship flying on star wars or star trek.Was totally silent. lIGHTS WERE PLACED ON CORNERS AND MIDDLES OF WING FROM WHAT I REMEBER.If our military cooked that up its awesome.AWESOME ONLY WORD FOR IT.
Summary: Seen a boomerang craft at high altitude. Appeared to be completing a turn moved away to northeast. Totally silent.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were 2 other sightings in Phoenix on or around May 29th 2009
